title: Flying Lotus
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/flying-lotus-vampire-smile.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/04/flying-lotus-vampire-smile.jpg)

A new Flying Lotus album emerging into the wild is always an event, but the release of COSMOGRAMMA on Flying Lotus’s myspace today quite possibly deserves a national holiday all of its own. So far Crack in the Road is on its second listen and we can confirm that the two year wait has very much been justified. The record is currently streaming for free right now, so head on over and get listening!

COSMOGRAMMA will be released on May 3rd in the UK and May 4th in the U.S. via Warp.

[Flying Lotus’s Myspace](http://www.myspace.com/flyinglotus)

[Pre-Order COSMOGRAMMA](http://itunes.apple.com/gb/preorder/cosmogramma/id367860301)
